QuestData.Title: Rastakhan's Might
QuestData.Description:
Do you see de ship out in de bay, $n?
Dat is my flagship, Rastakhan's Might. It is not here under my orders.
We will deal with de Prophet Zul in good time. For now, those who took my vessel must pay.
You are to bring me de head of Windcaller Ula'jan. De ship does not move without him, and it will not be moving again once he is dead!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The troll responsible for moving Rastakhan's Might to Zeb'ahari with the power of the winds.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Windcaller Ula'jan's skull aboard the flagship Rastakhan's Might.
